name: fashion-prospects
description: This app helps the freelance chefs to post their meals and sale them online. Our registered clients can order the meals they want or choosing a specific chef to order from according to his rate or cuisine. The guest user can have overview about our app also but with a limited permissions.

scripts.start:server: cd server && npm run start && cd ..
scripts.dev:client: cd client && npm run serve && cd ..
scripts.dev:server: cd server && npm run start && cd ..
